thread.section_title: Wilson Amplifiers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wilson Amplifiers | wilsonamplifiers.com
thread.title: Max Smith
thread.title_full: Wilson Amplifiers reviewed by Max Smith

author: Max Smith
title: Max Smith
text: This is a very good product, works excellent. I have had it in my old shop for 4-5 years, building a new shop and moved it there on a temporary mount. The wind blew it over and broke the outside antenna, I ordered a new one, it came right away. Excellent customer service, and as I said the unit works great, from 1 intermittent bar of signal to 3-5 bars.
